text:
Home > Photos > Ben Affleck PHOTOS Ben Affleck Can't Stop Smiling With New Girlfriend Lindsay Shookus Source: BACKGRID

Looks like a holiday weekend leaves Ben Affleck smiling for days! The actor was spotted out with his girlfriend, Lindsay Shookus, for a post-Thanksgiving coffee date.

Article continues below advertisement

Source: BACKGRID

The 45-year-old actor was all smiles next to his lady.

Source: BACKGRID

Dressed in a blue button down and gray blazer with jeans, Ben opted for a casual, but stylish look.

Article continues below advertisement

Source: BACKGRID

And so did Lindsay!

Source: BACKGRID

Lindsay sported a blue button down, with a tie in the front, and black jeans.

Article continues below advertisement

Source: BACKGRID

Ben reportedly spent his Thanksgiving holiday with his ex-wife, Jennifer Garner, and their three children together. Aww!

Source: BACKGRID

What do you think of Ben and Lindsay's coffee date? Let us know your thoughts!
